introduction.summary: I am a developer and SDLC-specialist eager to bring my 10+ years experience to an organization that values an eye for efficiency and drive for constant improvement. I have a reputation for delivering on complex projects and am strongly committed to paying down technical debt. I seek to teach and learn as I continue my track-record of enabling development teams to deliver high-quality software fast.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Dev-ops since 2016. Prior to that I developed for an internal application written in proprietary languages.
highlights: Added an efficiency-testing application, mail-server API, and search-feature to Core project.
Supported web and desktop display libraries with MEDITECH proprietary languages.
Designed and maintained Jenkins CI solution on GCP.
Authored dozens of features and bug-fixes for Jira-SVN integration and automation.
Oversaw migration from Python 2 to 3; refactored and improved coverage for several Python projects.
Provided developer-education through mentoring, presentations, classes, office hours, and documentation.
Served as scrum master and created roadmaps for software delivery-related epics.
